verbs.description: [ARG0: rookie] [ARG1: mike] [V: hughes] wears a lot of hats for vikings mike hughes drafted 30th as a cornerback by the vikings has started the past two games playing both nickel and left cornerback while working as both a punt and kickoff returner this season mike zimmer vikings meteor games mike hughes wrestler nickel corner mike hughes trae waynes mike priefer mackensie alexander
